data.name: Project Utgardr
data.detailed_description:
Official Roadmap...


About the Game

Project Utgardr is an adventure, parkour and puzzle solving game in an old and far land.
Based on exploration and nordic mythology...
"This is a non-game and none is playing with it..."



the story:

At this moment there is a playable Demo that tells the story of Sara, ventured in a far and old land and with an horrible threat hanging over her. She has to run out from that place, since her time is over...

In this Demo you could find beautiful landscapes, mountains and a mostly rocky scenery with an uncontaminated nature where you need to scramble to go ahead with the path.


the tutorial:

The game tutorial is progressive. This means that you will be advised when specific behaviours and actions will be required and the disposed keys combination on the keyboard or joystick.

the gameplay:

Inside the game you will need to hike on the rocks and obstacles on the route. By the way there are specific rocks and surfaces that you can climb, wall running and do other movement actions.

Some times you could encounter a collapsed or closed way... there you could need to search and explore a measure to proceed.
Oh yeah, i did not remember this... but an old nordic civilization in this area placed few strange rocks called "altars", that you can interact with...
Can they help you retrieve the path?


the power of the crystals:

Do not worry if you are in unsafe situations. If you fall down from an upland and you think that your end is near... there are some shimmering green crystals around where you will be teleported as soon as possible. And you can also bind your soul to them...

data.short_description: Project Utgardr is an adventure, parkour and puzzle solving game in an old and far land. Based on exploration and nordic mythology... "This is a non-game and none is playing with it..."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.20 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.40 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux 64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.20 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux 64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.40 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
